metadata.title: CVE-2014-8322 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the tcp_test function in aireplay-ng.c inAircrack-ng before 1.2 RC 1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycode via a crafted length parameter value.

criterions.comment: aircrack-ng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
